sources.title: Ghost-Town Gold
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Ghost-Town Gold (1936) THE THREE MESQUITEERS
sources.description:
Stars: Robert Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune 
 Director: Joseph Kane

 The three Mesquiteers try to recover the gold stolen by a gang in its effort to ruin the banker/mayor who ordered them to leave town.

sources.title: 1936 - Ghost Town Gold - The Dummy That Outsmarted Outlaws! Classic Western Movie
sources.description:
The three Mesquiteers; Stony Brooke (Robert Livingston), Tucson Smith (Ray "Crash" Corrigan), and Lullaby Joslin (Max Terhune), chase crooks who robbed Prospect Cityâ€™s bank, only to find the loot "haunted" by an eccentric prospector in a ghost town.  Our heroes dodge dynamite traps, brawl through saloons, outsmart and outgun the villains, and haul the loot back in a race against sunrise to drag that gold back before the bank opens!

Alternative title: The Ghost of the City of Gold (1936)

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/hDAxgI9JLl4

Director: Joseph Kane
Writers: John Rathmell, Oliver Drake, Bernard McConville
Stars: Robert Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune

Genres: Western, Drama
Series: The Three Mesquiteers (Film #2 of 51)
Release date: October 26, 1936
Filming location: Iverson Ranch

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Barrington's men rob the bank and hide the gold in a ghost town. The ghost town's only citizen finds the gold and tries to use it to bet on a boxing match. Seeing the gold, the Mesquiteers rush to the ghost town and recover the rest of it. They need to get it to the bank before it opens but Barrington's men stand in the way.
metadata.Writer: John Rathmell, Oliver Drake, Bernard McConville
metadata.Actors: Robert Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune
